1767.name: Share of people who are happy (Eurobarometer 2017)
1767.description: Share of people who say they are 'very satisfied' or 'fairly satisfied' with their life. Full question asks: "On the whole are you very satisfied, fairly satisfied, not very satisfied or not at all satisfied with the life you lead?"

source.name: Eurobarometer (2017)
source.additionalInfo: The Eurobarometer provides estimates for dated surveys. In some years, there are some countries with multiple surveys. In those cases, we provide yearly averages.
